sentence.Network_en: There wasn't time to cook the unthawed turkey, so they had to settle for hotdogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 已经来不及做这只没解冻的火鸡了, 所以他们只能吃热狗了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1. pipsqueak n.小人物，无足轻重的东西2. unthawed adj. 未化解的3. bleak adj. 严峻的；寒冷的

sentences.sentence: "there was'nt time to cook the unthawed turkey, so they had to settle for hotdogs"
